summary: Did Jesus exist? This film starts with that question, then goes on to examine Christianity as a whole.
cast: Sam Harris|Robert M. Price|Richard Carrier|Earl Doherty|Scott Butcher|Alan Dundes|Jerry Falwell|Brian Flemming|Barbara Mikkelson|David Mikkelson|James Robison|Ronald G. Sipus|Bailey Smith|Dean Wycoff
title: The God Who Wasn't There
